subsection.name: 6.1 Introduction
subsection.p:
CayenneModeler is a Java GUI application that performs the following functions:
Reverse-engineering of RDBMS schema to create Cayenne data maps.
Forward-engineering (generation) of the database schema from a data map.
Java class generation from a data map.
Cayenne project deployment organization into domains and nodes.

subsection.name: 6.2 Running CayenneModeler
subsection.p: CayenneModeler is a regular Java application and can be run on a JSDK1.4 compatible JVM. Main class is org.objectstyle.cayenne.gui.Editor. For convenience Cayenne distribution provides run scripts to start modeler on Windows and UNIX platforms.
